titles.title: Relating to a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 324.

DEMAND THAT WORDS BE TAKEN DOWN - During the course of debate on the resolution, objection was made to certain remarks to the extent that the words be taken down. Subsequently, the words in question were withdrawn by unanimous consent. The House resumed debate.
Mr. McCrery moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 170 - 143 (Roll no. 397).

bill.summary: 7/18/2003--Laid on table in House. Declares that the House of Representatives disapproves of the manner in which Representative Thomas conducted the markup of legislation in the Committee on Ways and Means on July 18, 2003, and finds that the bill considered at that markup was not validly ordered reported to the House.
